description.value:
Level 4 Evocation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined self

Components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or a firefly)

Duration: 10 minutes

Wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding Bright Light|XPHB in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 10 feet. The flames provide you with a warm shield or a chill shield, as you choose. The warm shield grants you Resistance|XPHB to Cold damage, and the chill shield grants you Resistance|XPHB to Fire damage. In addition, whenever a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack roll, the shield erupts with flame. The attacker takes 2d8 Fire damage from a warm shield or 2d8 Cold damage from a chill shield.
